title: Is Eminem releasing a new album in 2020 or 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably not, I think hes finally realizing how irrelevant he is and how his new style sucks. Coming from a childhood Eminem fan. If you need new music from eminem though, check this list of rare music. Infinite Album (1996)Slim Shady EP (1998)Difficult (really depressing song)Nail In The Coffin (Ray Benzino Diss)Bully (Ray Benzino Diss)The Warning (Mariah Carey Diss)Pooh Butt Day (1988)Bang (Conway the Machine collab) (2019)All Bad Meets Evil albums (Royce and Eminem duo rap)Any D12 albums (omg they are perfect)Basically there is a bunch more rare songs or uncommon eminem stuff I could list, but it would take forever. Check out this link for every bootleg, rare, unreleased, or any collab eminem has EVER done lmao: List of all Eminem songs (1988-2019) PS: Listen to Infinite it is eminems best album ever on god.

He recently released Music To Be Murdered By. In terms of an album in 2021, I don’t know. Eminem is usually very quiet on social media and nobody knows where he is. He usually goes off the grid for sometime until he comes out with a song or an album. In my opinion, Eminem should still make music but the thing is that all of the music today are targeting young audiences. So Eminem’s music wouldn’t impact too much on the young generation. At 47 years old, he accomplished so much and if I was in his position, I would retire. I would also mentor younger rappers and be a mentor. That’s what I would do if I was Eminem. Just like how Dr. Dre mentored Eminem back then.
